# `NotificationsSettings` Definition

Notification settings that handles messenger notifications

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| enabled | `boolean` | No | The toggle to enable or disable notifications. When enabled, PushNotificationTitle and PushNotificationBody localization keys are required. |
| notificationContentType | `string` | No | The notification content type settings for messenger |
